commits.content:
<?php

namespace App\Http\Controllers;

use App\Models\Invoice;
use Illuminate\Http\Request;

class PDFController extends Controller
{
    public function downloadpdf(){
        $invoice = Invoice::all();

        $data = [
            'date' => date('m/d/y'),
            'invoice' => $invoice
        ];
    }
}
